publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2967 Pauline McNeill: Fire Safety at Glasgow Royal Infirmary-That the Parliament welcomes the Â£250,000 installation of hi-tech fire alarms at Glasgow Royal Infirmary as the final stage of an overall upgrade to increase safety for staff, patients and the public in every ward and building.
S1M-2967 Fire Safety at Glasgow Royal Infirmary (lodged on 5 April 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*
S1M-2967 Fire Safety at Glasgow Royal Infirmary (lodged on 5 April 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2967 Fire Safety at Glasgow Royal Infirmary (lodged on 5 April 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-2967 Fire Safety at Glasgow Royal Infirmary (lodged on 5 April 2002) Janis Hughes*
